lead_paragraph: In 2005, Honda dropped the body style that defined the original Civic in the United States in the ’70s. What is old is new again.
snippet: In 2005, Honda dropped the body style that defined the original Civic in the United States in the ’70s. What is old is new again....

headline.main: Video Review: The Honda Civic Is Back as a Hatchback
headline.print_headline: Honda’s Hatchback Makes a Return Engagement
